intro: I work full-time as a Solution Analyst at Deloitte, modernizing outdated systems to allow our clients to better fulfill their needs. Aside from that, I spend a considerable amount of my spare time challenging myself with new technologies and expanding my skillset. I enjoy solving difficult problems and strive to make an impact on the world around me.

projects.title: Projects
projects.gameReviewDesc: A group project on creating a web application where users can sign up and review video games. I contributed by writing REST APIs and integrating external APIs to extend the functionality of the application
projects.sobelDesc: A group research project on parellizing edge detection algorithms. Contributed by writing prototypes and researching methods to parallelize the Sobel edge detection algorithm.
projects.backtesterDesc: An ongoing project on creating a TUI backtesting engine for trading and investing. I am currently learning Go and have built a prototype of a backtesting engine.

skills.title: Skills
skills.javascript: As my primary language at work, I'm very comfortable with JavaScript and have built multiple projects with it.
skills.python: I enjoy using Python for rapid prototyping, studying data structures, and handling various data pre-processing tasks.
skills.linux: I have ~1.5 years of linux experience on server and desktop, I am quite comfortable with the Linux ecosystem and find it enjoyable.
skills.go: I'm currently learning Go by building a backtesting engine and find it to be a very enjoyable and efficient language.
skills.react: I have built projects with both React and React Native and use it frequently in my professional work for UI development.
skills.databases: I have experience working with both SQL and NoSQL databases and have used both types in various personal projects.
